trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Clearwater
There were no other sightings in Clearwater on or around March 16th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsMarch 14, 2004 St. Petersburg Fl....at about 1100 PM I went out on my 3rd floorbalcony and looked up at a some what hazy night sky. I was facing to the west.All of a sudden a fuzzy round light about the size of a basketball appearedabove the tree tops and seemed to be bouncing ping pong fashion in a straightline from south towards the north it was quickly followed by two more of thesame lights that also just appeared and then went on in this bouncing manner. Icontinued to see these three lights until I could no longer view them becausethe building blocked my view.I ran thru my house to see out of the Northern window but they were gone.
